title: Live news: The week ahead
FirstFT: Vietnam and US boost ties in move to counter China
description: Also in today’s newsletter, Western nations accept ‘climbdown’ on Ukraine and rescuers dig for quake survivors in Morocco

title: Sunak refuses pensions ‘triple lock’ commitment for Tory manifesto
description: Premier risks backlash from MPs fearful of alienating older voters in general election

title: Israel delegation visits Saudi Arabia as Unesco meeting observers
description: Meeting — though not bilateral — marks latest sign of developing ties as US pushes for Middle East realignment

title: Luis Rubiales resigns as Spanish football chief in wake of World Cup kiss
description: ‘It is clear that I will not be able to return to my position,’ says under-fire head of national association

title: PwC to curtail consulting work for US audit clients to reduce conflict risk
description: New independence policies are challenge to other Big Four accounting firms

title: Yellen denies G20 weakened statement on Ukraine at New Delhi summit
description: US treasury secretary touts successes at world leaders’ meeting while rejecting criticism of language over war

title: UK SMEs not ready for ‘avalanche’ of Brexit 2.0 rules and taxes
description: Business group warns small and medium-sized companies face significant new obligations

title: UK unions to challenge anti-strike laws at UN watchdog
description: TUC says legislation requiring some employees to work during industrial action falls short of international standards

title: A testing week for Apple and ECB rate-setters
description: Plus Catalonia celebrates its national day and fashion retailers H&M and Inditex report earnings

title: Teaching case: Digging into the ethics of cobalt mining
description: As demand grows for the material used in batteries, this MBA-style case study explores ethical dilemmas over unregulated mines in the Democratic Republic of Congo

title: Meloni calls for ‘mutually beneficial’ China trade as Belt & Road decision looms
description: Italy seeks to extricate itself from Beijing’s flagship foreign policy initiative without provoking its wrath

title: Western nations accept ‘climbdown’ on Ukraine to salvage G20’s relevance
description: US, EU and others agreed to remove condemnation of Putin’s invasion from meeting’s communique

title: Rescuers dig for quake survivors in Morocco
description: At least 2,000 people have been killed but many more could still be trapped in collapsed buildings in mountain villages

title: A northern English town looks to BAE Systems to help it ‘level up’
description: Barrow-in-Furness hopes the UK defence company’s bulging order book will serve to regenerate the area

title: America’s New Right is moving beyond Reaganism
description: Capitalism is coming in for Republican criticism as a political pivot point emerges

title: Flash floods on dry ground around the world follow record heatwaves
description: Heavy rainfall after sustained period of extreme heat leads to greater run-off and destruction

title: Will the ECB deliver one more rate rise?
description: Market Questions is the FT’s guide to the week ahead

title: Biden edges closer to decision on supplying Ukraine with long-range missiles
description: Washington fears striking Russian territory risks escalating the conflict

title: Have we reached peak pessimism on China?
description: The consensus now sees the country stagnating long term, but is missing more dramatic short-term scenarios

title: Influx of Russian fraudsters gives Turkish cyber crime hub new lease of life
description: Émigré hackers fleeing Putin’s military conscription prompts surge in activity involving stolen financial data

title: When economic data is uncertain, official statisticians should say so
description: The ONS will redouble efforts to ensure the public can have faith in its work

title: Sunak accuses China of interfering in UK ‘parliamentary democracy’
description: Prime minister’s comments come after arrest of two men under the Official Secrets Act

title: Lawyers concerned about ‘extraordinary’ FRC code omission
description: Response to proposed update of UK corporate governance code criticises failure to formalise role of general counsel

title: The EU’s transformations will reshape its ‘British question’ too
description: Ukraine’s likely accession to the bloc and the process of internal reform will have a transformative effect

title: Vietnam to upgrade US relationship to level with China
description: Biden set to sign strategic partnership on Hanoi visit to counter Beijing’s assertiveness in region

title: G20 backs bigger role for reformed World Bank
description: Changes seen as crucial in helping poorer nations finance the switch from fossil fuels to green technologies

title: Crunch time for Biden and US economy as auto industry strike looms
description: President could be forced to pick a side as car workers demand pay rises from profitable Detroit Three

title: Deadly Johannesburg fire exposes post-apartheid South Africa’s systemic failures
description: Slum dwelling where 77 people died reflects many of the things that have gone wrong in the country and wider region

title: Deep divide over Pinochet coup pushes Chile’s polarisation to extremes
description: Leftist president’s unity drive over 50th anniversary of putsch backfires, aggravating country’s political paralysis

title: Employers and staff seek truce on office working
description: While some companies are tightening mandates on working from home, more are moving to flexible models

title: How British chicken got caught in the country’s economic storm
description: The poultry industry is facing an onslaught of different upheavals that have thrust the once fast-growing sector into crisis

title: Mizuho seeks to break curse over foreign forays on Wall Street
description: Japanese lender targets US investment banking top 10 after acquisition of boutique firm Greenhill

title: Shipping industry legal action surges as Ukraine war drives ‘emotive’ disputes
description: Falling profits and tension over Black Sea dangers behind rise in arbitration, lawyers say

title: Top German defence official vows to speed up procurement in response to Ukraine war
description: Annette Lehnigk-Emden says agency is pushing back against bureaucracy as part of security overhaul by Berlin

title: UAE boosts trade with Iran after eased restrictions on business activity
description: Flourishing relationship reflects Gulf state’s pivot towards regional de-escalation
